The _Polishing Wheel_ is a block similar to the _Crushing Wheel_ that can _Polish_ items in large amounts.
death.attack.create_so.polish: %1$s curiously walked into a pair of polishing wheels, it didn't end well
death.attack.create_so.sandpaper: %1$s was brutally scrubbed to death with a sandpaper
item.create.sand_paper.tooltip.behaviour: Polishes items held in the _offhand_ or lying on the _floor_ when _looking at them_
Directly polishes the _block you are looking at_
item.create.sand_paper.tooltip.summary: Can be used to _refine materials_ and _polish blocks_. The process can be automated with a Deployer.
item.create_so.obsidian_sandpaper.toolti: Applies polish to items held in the _offhand_ or lying on the _floor_ when _looking at them_
Directly polishes the _block you are looking at_
A _very sturdy_ _sandpaper_. Can be used to _refine materials_ or _polish blocks_. The process can be automated with a Deployer.
